Calculate Bk Matrices for Autoregressive (AR) Model

Source: R/Simulation_helper_functions.R
calculate_Bk_matrices.Rd

Computes the coefficient matrices (Bk) for an autoregressive (AR) model using lagged covariance matrices.

calculate_Bk_matrices(C_k_matrices)

Arguments

C_k_matrices

A list of covariance matrices, where each matrix represents the covariance at a different time lag. C_k_matrices[[1]] is the covariance matrix at lag 0.

Value

A list of Bk matrices (coefficient matrices) for the AR model, including Bk_0, which is derived separately from the rest of the Bk matrices.

Contents
